edge: The film features original musical score composed by Italian composer Andrea Guerra.
Anu Malik, an Indian music composer and singer, made his debut in Bollywood with the film's original musical score.
Two songs in the film were sung by Kumar Sanu.
Sung by Kumar Sanu in the film's album.
Sadhana Sargam made a comeback on this album for the hit duet song with Kumar Sanu.
Papon sang 'Moh Moh Ke Dhaage' (male) in the film's album.
Sisters Jyoti and Sultana Nooran sang one of the songs in the film's album.
Kumar Sanu sang 'Tuu Meri Sare Inteha' in the film's album.
Malini Awasthi sang 'Sunder Susheel' in the film's album, along with Rahul Ram.
Monali Thakur sang 'Moh Moh Ke Dhaage' (female) in the film's album and won the National Film Award for Best Female Playback Singer.
Papon and Bishal Phukan sang 'Prem's Theme' in the film's album.
